column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I've had lots of stuff there over the years
column2: and they've changed their menu a little
column3: but in general I'd recommend both potato dishes - a garlic potato salad and roasted ones with an alioli dipping sauce
column4: the pintxos platter (especially if you are with only 2 people
column5: since it lets you try 6 things)
